abstract: David Raskin, Christopher J. Morvillo and Edward C. O'Callaghan, all alumni of the United States attorney's office in Manhattan, will soon become litigation partners in New York.
snippet: David Raskin, Christopher J. Morvillo and Edward C. O'Callaghan, all alumni of the United States attorney's office in Manhattan, will soon become litigation partners in New York.
lead_paragraph: Three former federal prosecutors from New York are reuniting in private practice, agreeing to join the law firm Clifford Chance, the firm said on Thursday.
